originalText.text: Today an employee working here clarified she has no hand soap for the restroom and that when she uses the bathroom she just uses water to wash her hands. If you drop your clothes off: know that the employees are folding "clean" clothes with dirty hands.

text.text: Today an employee working here clarified she has no hand soap for the restroom and that when she uses the bathroom she just uses water to wash her hands. If you drop your clothes off: know that the employees are folding "clean" clothes with dirty hands.

originalText.text: I'm really disappointed. I wish I could give this place 5 stars. They have a service where they wash your clothes for you. I specifically asked that each bag I brought in be washed separately, and one employee continues to wash them together. She also has told me that I bring in too many clothes (2-3 bags). Or to return another day.  I've been going here for years, but this woman who gave me a fake name has made this place intolerable. Find yourself a place that is going to do the service you are paying for correctly.

originalText.text: Worst laundromat probably in New York the lady works there is extremely rude and disrespectful and she cussed me out in Spanish thinking I don’t understand every time I go she is very disrespectful this was my last time I’m never going there again

originalText.text: Not on the main cycle. Its not hot ať all!! Instead of argue why don’t u fix it! Several people left your facility because of this. That’s how u run your business be dishonest?!? You don’t have hot water. Any machine ever has hot water. You should really fix it and have it at least like other places. Most of your colleagues doing the same scam on us but your water is barely room temp! You should be ashamed.

originalText.text:
Super easy going, free machines, working well!
Fair prices.

Just remember to bring cash with you cos it still operates with quarters. - they have the machine for the quarters but you need cash for it / they also have an atm inside .
